named-query.name: listConferences
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Conference c ORDER BY c.dateFrom

named-query.name: listTalks
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Talk t WHERE t.conference.id=:cId ORDER BY t.dateOn, t.timeFrom

named-query.name: listTalksForRoom
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Talk t WHERE t.conference.id=:cId and t.room.id=:rId ORDER BY t.dateOn, t.timeFrom

named-query.name: listTalksForSpeaker
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Talk t JOIN FETCH t.assignments a WHERE t.conference.id=:cId and a.speaker.id=:sId ORDER BY t.dateOn, t.timeFrom
